short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for leveraging text predictions based on machine learning models trained via typelike.me.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TypeLikeMe provides custom typing suggestions for form inputs and textareas.

- Pick one of the available community trained models
or
- Go to https://typelike.me/model.html and use your own text to train a new model

- Copy and paste the model key into the extension settings to use predictions tailored to your needs.
